home.subtitle: AI-driven code knowledge base supporting code analysis, document generation, and knowledge graph creation

form.title: Add Repository
form.description: Add a Git repository or upload local files to create a knowledge base
form.customDescription: Manually specify organization and repository names for special scenarios
form.fileUploadDescription: Upload files in ZIP, TAR, or TAR.GZ format
form.branchPlaceholder: Enter branch name or select from dropdown
form.branchHelperText: You can select a branch from the dropdown or manually enter a branch name

validation.fileRequired: Please select a file to upload

layout.checkRepositoryAddress: Please check if the repository address is correct
layout.mindMapDescription: Visualize the knowledge structure and document relationships of the repository
layout.mindMapGenerating: Mind map may be generating, please refresh later
layout.mindMapHints: Click nodes to open links • Mouse wheel to zoom • Drag to pan
layout.loginRequired: Please log in first to download
layout.downloadTooltip: Export Markdown files as ZIP archive

document.manualTocDescription: This document has few contents, table of contents is manually enabled. You can turn it off at any time.

mindMap.helpText: Left-click to drag • Scroll wheel to zoom • Double-click node to view details • Right-click menu to edit

detail.documentListDescription: Browse and manage documents in the repository
detail.knowledgeGraphDescription: Visualize the knowledge structure of the repository

settings.title: System Settings
settings.description: Configure and manage system functionality settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
settings.resetGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings in current group to default values?
settings.restartRequiredMessage: Some setting changes require system restart to take effect
settings.restartConfirmMessage: System restart may take a few minutes, are you sure you want to continue?

importExport.title: Import/Export
importExport.exportNoteDescription: Exported settings file does not include sensitive information like passwords and API keys
importExport.importNoteDescription: Importing settings will overwrite existing configuration. Please ensure you have a backup.
importExport.selectGroupsDescription: Choose groups to export; leave empty to export all
importExport.dragFileHere: Click or drag file here to upload
importExport.securityTip1: Only import settings from trusted sources
importExport.securityTip2: Check settings content carefully before import
importExport.securityTip3: Sensitive information is not exported; reconfigure after import
importExport.securityTip4: Restart the system after import to ensure changes take effect

settings.basicDescription: Configure basic website information, including name, logo, description, etc.
settings.emailDescription: Configure SMTP mail server for sending system notifications
settings.aiDescription: Configure AI models and API settings for code analysis and document generation
settings.storageDescription: Configure file storage, upload limits, and cloud storage settings
settings.securityDescription: Configure password policies, session management, IP access control, and other security settings
settings.documentDescription: Configure document processing, code analysis, and repository processing settings
settings.thirdPartyDescription: Configure {{platform}} OAuth integration and API access settings

basic.siteLogoPlaceholder: Please enter logo URL or upload image
basic.analyticsCodePlaceholder: Enter Google Analytics or other analytics code
basic.analyticsCodeHelp: Supports Google Analytics, Baidu Analytics, etc.

email.securityNoteDescription: Mail passwords and other sensitive information will be encrypted and stored, please ensure SMTP server configuration is correct
email.maxEmailsPerHourHelp: Limit the number of emails sent by the system per hour
email.emailTemplatePlaceholder: HTML email template with variable replacement support
email.emailTemplateHelp: Supports HTML format, can use {{variable_name}} for replacement
email.defaultTestBody: This is a test email to verify that the email configuration is working correctly.
email.testNoteDescription: The test email will be sent to the specified email address using the current configuration, please ensure the configuration information is correct

ai.testRequiredFields: Please configure API endpoint and key first
ai.apiKeyNoteDescription: API keys are sensitive information that will be encrypted and stored, please keep them safe
ai.presencePenaltyHelp: Encourage discussion of new topics, -2.0 to 2.0
ai.customBodyParamsHelp: Add custom parameters to all AI model API requests
ai.customBodyParamsNote: These parameters will be automatically added to the body of all AI API requests. Supports string, number, and boolean types. Restart service after modifying this setting.
ai.mem0Help: Mem0 is a memory management system that can help AI remember previous conversations
ai.testDescription: Test if the current configuration can connect to the AI service normally
ai.testNoteDescription: The test will send a simple request to the AI service to verify connection and authentication

storage.fileStoragePathHelp: Ensure the path exists and has read/write permissions
storage.maxFileSizeHelp: Maximum size limit for individual files
storage.storageTiersHelp: Select default storage tier for files
storage.cloudStorageConfigHelp: Enter corresponding configuration information according to the selected provider
storage.tip1: Regularly clean up expired temporary files and logs
storage.tip2: Enable compression for large files to save space
storage.tip3: Migrate infrequently accessed files to cold storage
storage.tip4: Set reasonable file upload size limits

security.securityNoteDescription: Security settings will affect all users' access, please modify with caution
security.sessionTimeoutHelp: Automatic logout time for user inactivity
security.twoFactorAuthHelp: Add an extra security layer to user accounts
security.twoFactorAuthEnabledDescription: Users can configure two-factor authentication in their personal settings
security.allowedIpHelp: Only these IP addresses can access the system
security.allowedIpDescription: Leave empty to allow all IP access
security.blockedIpHelp: These IP addresses will be blocked from access
security.captchaConfigHelp: Enter corresponding configuration information according to the selected provider
security.tip5: Monitor system logs and abnormal activities

thirdParty.setupNoteDescription: Before using {{platform}} integration, you need to create an OAuth app on {{platform}}
thirdParty.enableOAuthHelp: Allow users to login with {{platform}} accounts
thirdParty.allowedOrganizationsHelp: Restrict access to members of these organizations only
thirdParty.allowedOrganizationsDescription: Leave empty to allow all users
thirdParty.enableAutoSyncHelp: Periodically synchronize repository information and permissions
thirdParty.defaultRepositoryHelp: Default repository access permissions for new users
thirdParty.callbackUrlsDescription: You need to configure the following callback URLs in the OAuth app settings
thirdParty.step2: Copy Client ID and Client Secret

document.enableIncrementalUpdateHelp: Only process changed files to improve efficiency
document.maxFileReadCountHelp: Maximum number of files to process in a single batch
document.defaultLanguageHelp: Default programming language for documents and code
document.enableSmartFilterHelp: AI intelligently identifies and filters irrelevant files
document.smartFilterNote: Smart filtering can automatically identify configuration files, dependency files, and other files that don't need processing
document.excludedFilesHelp: These files will be skipped during processing
document.excludedFoldersHelp: These folders will be skipped during processing
document.enableCodeDependencyAnalysisHelp: Analyze dependency relationships between code files
document.enableCodeCompressionHelp: Compress code content to save storage space
document.enableWarehouseFunctionPromptTaskHelp: Generate functional descriptions and usage tips for repositories
document.enableWarehouseDescriptionTaskHelp: Automatically generate detailed descriptions for repositories
document.enableFileCommitHelp: Automatically commit file changes after processing
document.enableWarehouseCommitHelp: Automatically commit repository changes after processing
document.refineAndEnhanceQualityHelp: Use AI to optimize document quality and readability
document.tip1: Enable smart filtering can significantly improve processing speed
document.tip2: Set reasonable exclusion rules for files and folders
document.tip3: Adjust maximum read tokens based on repository size and AI model limits
document.tip4: Regularly clean up failed processing tasks
document.readMaxTokensHelp: Maximum tokens to read per AI request (1000-200000)
document.proxyHelp: HTTP/HTTPS proxy for Git operations, format: http://proxy-server:port
document.enableAgentToolHelp: Enable the Agent tool plugin to enhance functionality. By default, it provides in-depth planning capabilities.

ui.securitySettingsDesc: Manage your account security and password settings

ui.appSettingsDesc: Manage your app preferences and notification options
ui.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive important updates and notification emails
ui.confirmDeleteAvatarDesc: Are you sure you want to delete the current avatar? This action cannot be undone.
ui.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF formats, file size not exceeding 2MB
ui.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters, containing uppercase, lowercase letters and numbers

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Delete Repository
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete repository "{{name}}"?
deleteDialog.warning: This action is irreversible and will delete the repository and all its document data.

detail.deleteRepositoryWarning: This action will permanently delete the repository and all its data. This operation cannot be undone.
detail.selectDocumentDescription: Select a document from the left directory to view or edit its content
detail.syncManagementDescription: Manage repository synchronization settings and history
detail.syncDescription: This will pull the latest files from the source repository and regenerate documents.
detail.permissionManagementDescription: Manage user and role access to this repository
detail.configManagementDescription: Manage various configuration options for the repository
detail.taskManagementDescription: View and manage repository-related processing tasks
detail.editRepositoryDescription: Modify repository basic information and sync settings
detail.enableAutoSyncDescription: System will automatically sync repository updates when enabled

aiGenerateDialog.title: AI Smart Generate Document Content
aiGenerateDialog.description: Generate content for the currently selected document directory. You can enter custom prompts to guide AI generation, or leave empty to use default prompts.
aiGenerateDialog.promptPlaceholder: e.g.: Please generate detailed technical documentation, including code examples and architecture explanations...
aiGenerateDialog.promptHint: Tip: Leave empty to use system default prompt or previously saved prompt

chart.description: View token usage across different time periods
